title: Best-Loved Casseroles
description: Savor America's true comfort food the casserole! This sumptuous collection of recipes brings together time-tested favorites and exciting new ideas that are sure to please family and friends. You'll discover perfect casserole recipes for sinfully delicious Sunday brunches, exotic ethnic specialties, hearty one-dish meals, and much more all featuring the best ingredients from your favorite brands. Learn to make: - Shrimp Noodle Supreme - Sour Cream Tortilla Casserole - Fresh Vegetable Lasagna - Classic Hamburger Casserole - Brunch Strata - Chicken & Biscuits - And more!Stuffed with tantalizing full-color photographs, Best-Loved Casseroles is a must-have kitchen companion.
author: Publications International
